nodes.excerpt: TweetDeets gives you an insightful look at a Twitter account's activity. Instead of just a feed of tweets, you see their posting calendar, most frequent posting times, top words, posts by platform, and more in a clean, shareable report.
nodes.title: TweetDeets - Simple, handy metrics for any public Twitter account
nodes.author: Gregg Blanchard

localize.description: TweetDeets让你深入了解一个Twitter账户的活动。你可以在一个干净的、可分享的报告中看到他们的发帖日历、最频繁的发帖时间、最热门的词、按平台分类的帖子等，而不仅仅是一个推文的feed。
localize.tagline: 任何公共Twitter账户都有简单、方便的指标。

localize.description: TweetDeets讓你深入瞭解一個Twitter賬戶的活動。你可以在一個乾淨的、可分享的報告中看到他們的發帖日曆、最頻繁的發帖時間、最熱門的詞、按平臺分類的帖子等，而不僅僅是一個推文的feed。
localize.tagline: 任何公共Twitter賬戶都有簡單、方便的指標。

nodes.excerpt: Find the most converting headline on your landing site with Juggler! It is an intuitive and straightforward A/B testing tool for your site and it's fully online. Just add the lightweight script on your site and you are ready to find the best headline!

nodes.excerpt: Developers have been using the Grouparoo UI to set up automated data movement from their databases to cloud-based tools like Mailchimp. Grouparoo now supports declarative code to set up this pipeline so you manage data sync just like you would any other app.

localize.description: 开发人员一直在使用Grouparoo用户界面来设置从他们的数据库到Mailchimp等云端工具的自动数据移动。Grouparoo现在支持声明式代码来设置这个管道，所以你可以像管理其他应用一样管理数据同步。
localize.tagline: 使用低代码配置与营销工具集成

localize.description: 開發人員一直在使用Grouparoo用戶界面來設置從他們的數據庫到Mailchimp等雲端工具的自動數據移動。Grouparoo現在支持聲明式代碼來設置這個管道，所以你可以像管理其他應用一樣管理數據同步。
localize.tagline: 使用低代碼配置與營銷工具集成

nodes.excerpt: Send Letters Online! 💌 1. Write your letter ✍️, enter the receiver's address 📮 & pay $. 2. Letterflix's automated PrintCenter will print 🖨, package 📨, and ship 🚀. 3. Your loved ones will receive it within 7 days 🥳 🤩 or 10-15 days in another country 🌏.
nodes.title: Letterflix - Send letters online 💌
nodes.author: Rajat Dangi

localize.description: 在线发送信件! 💌 1. 写好你的信✍️，输入收信人的地址📮，并支付$。 2. Letterflix的自动打印中心将打印🖨，包装📨，并运送🚀。3. 您的亲人将在7天内收到🥳 🤩，或在其他国家10-15天内收到🌏。
localize.tagline: 在线寄信 💌。

nodes.excerpt: Buy less, by knowing more. Discover great quality clothes that don’t sacrifice the environment or the people that made them. Putting sustainable brands front and centre. ✅ Find clothes made by brands that care ✅ Read honest reviews from people, not brands ✅ Make more informed purchases
nodes.title: Good Garms - Curated sustainable clothing
nodes.author: Bryn Taylor

localize.description: 通过了解更多信息，减少购买量。发现那些不以牺牲环境或制造它们的人为代价的优质服装。把可持续发展的品牌放在首位。✅ 寻找由关心环境的品牌所制造的衣服 ✅ 阅读来自人们而非品牌的诚实评论 ✅ 进行更明智的购买。
